text: Crispin Narciso Lupas Salvador is a Filipino writer. ==Literary Character== Crispin Salvador is a main character in Syjuco's novel Ilustrado. Crispin Salvador's existence has been believed to be real by various readers of Ilustrado — a book comprising excerpted work by Salvador (memoirs, stories, interviews, essays, poems, jokes, etc.). ==References== Category:Literary forgeries Category:Fictional writers
title: Crispin Salvador
